title: Why 33% of Men Have No Sexual Partners Today #shorts
description:
Here's a clip from a podcast episode with  @Purplepillpod  #shorts 
Full Video 🔗: https://www.youtube.com/live/0JW09-y_S90

———————————————————
Ready to build a network of amazing women and high-status men? 

Michael’s Men of Action Mentoring Program is a Master’s course dedicated to helping people elevate their social lives by becoming higher status and building elite social circles.

Click the link to learn how you can start living the high-status social life you always wanted: https://m.moamentoring.com/podcast

channel_info.title: Michael Sartain
channel_info.description:
🎙Host of The Michael Sartain Podcast

transcription: {"text": "33% of men having zero sexual partners between the age of 18 to 30. And then I also see that there's only 20% of men that are considered attractive. Well, isn't that not unassailable proof that hypergamy is real? Of course it is. Yeah, of course it is. Now, at this point, if you deny hypergamy, you're doing so because of your own opinion and now your feelings are outweighing your facts, nothing in my program or my podcast is ever a function of my feelings outweighing facts. I'm never going to have explosive growth. I'm just going to tell you right now, no matter how popular I get, it's because evolutionary psychology is not viewed positively by the left because of the gender roles it describes in the past, not necessarily today. The gender roles between men and women were not confusing 50,000 years ago. They were very, very clearly defined 50,000 years ago. I'm not saying that's right. And I'm not saying that's wrong, but it is what is. And the people on the right don't like evolutionary psychology because it's evolution. It's a scientific explanation for all of our proclivities. Well, I thought that was God. No, actually the reason why you like sugar is because sugar actually helped your ancestors survive.
